entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned as someone who will be perfectly safe and remaining hidden at her parents' house. She is described as a member of the Auror Office (211).

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as saying that Tonks will be perfectly safe and providing information about her whereabouts.

entities.name: parents
entities.description: Tonks' parents are mentioned as the place where she will be remaining hidden.

relationships.description: Lupin informs Tonks about her safety and whereabouts.
Tonks will be staying with her parents.
